game.name: Zombilliards
game.description:
Can you really combine pool and zombies? Of course you can! Avoid Zombie limbs and pot all the balls! (Oh and look out for the occasional flood of cockroaches!)

We have good news for all the billiard game lovers! Are you one of those who love potting balls on the pool table during vacant hours? If yes, we have got you covered today with a brand new pool game where you will get a chance to enjoy your favorite sports in a zombie-themed billiard hall. Does not it sound pretty exciting and exhilarating? Join Zombilliards and be prepared to enjoy a lovely sport that combines both pool and zombies beautifully!

Your objective in this arcade-style HTML5 challenge is to pot all the balls that you see on the pool table while avoiding the zombie limbs. Get ready to face off the occasional flood of cockroaches in the advanced level! Try to use as minimum moves as you can to complete each level with a high score! Be careful, dodge obstacles and slime holes and make sure that you hit all the balls to complete all tricky billiard levels in this action-packed zombie game!

The challenges and obstacles will keep increasing on the tables and you are expected to see new zombie parts in the further levels. Try to hit your balls while avoiding different zombie parts and unwanted holes to create your best score! No need to bother about in case if you find this billiard-based zombie pool challenge a little bit boring since we cover all the latest pool games that are enough to keep you glued to the screen for long without download. Check out our extensive list of free sports games, find your best pool challenge and have a blast in solo mode or choose to have fun with your friends in multiplayer mode!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Zombilliards at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: KEEP PRESS AND SWIPE ON THE BALL TO SELECT THE DIRECTION, RELESE TO SHOOT THE BALL
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS AND SWIPE ON THE BALL TO SELECT THE DIRECTION, RELESE TO SHOOT THE BALL BY L CLICK OF MOUSE
